parser

Class DefaultSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.DefaultSettings

  • public class DefaultSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates a new object of type DefaultSettings. It contains various default settings for the slideshow, including the background colour, font, font size and font colour to be used as default if the information is not given for a specific object.
    Version:
    2.1
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.
